scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production pm2 start src/app.js --name autenticacao
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development pm2 start src/app.js --name autenticacao --watch src
scripts.dev:liberal: cross-env RATE_LIMIT_IP_POINTS=10000 RATE_LIMIT_LOGIN_POINTS=1000 NODE_ENV=development node src/app.js
scripts.dev:strict: cross-env RATE_LIMIT_IP_POINTS=10 RATE_LIMIT_LOGIN_POINTS=3 NODE_ENV=development node src/app.js
scripts.reset-limits: redis-cli FLUSHDB && echo Rate limits resetados
scripts.test:unit:fast: cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules" jest tests/unit/jwtManager-optimized.test.js tests/unit/healthCheck-simple.test.js tests/unit/rateLimitConfig.test.js tests/unit/basic.test.js tests/unit/jwt-isolated.test.js --detectOpenHandles --forceExit
scripts.test:unit:quick: cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules" jest tests/unit/basic.test.js tests/unit/rateLimitConfig.test.js tests/unit/jwt-isolated.test.js --detectOpenHandles --forceExit
scripts.test:coverage:fast: cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules" jest tests/unit/jwtManager-optimized.test.js tests/unit/healthCheck-simple.test.js tests/unit/rateLimitConfig.test.js tests/unit/basic.test.js --coverage --detectOpenHandles --forceExit
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:load
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker-compose down && docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up -d
scripts.ci:test: npm run lint:check && npm run test:unit:fast && npm run test:integration:app
scripts.ci:build: npm run build && npm run build:docker
scripts.ci:deploy: npm run ci:test && npm run ci:build
